effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to begin a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of Overpower by 5%, stacking up to 10 times. 
Overpower has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends you gain 2% Haste and your Mortal Strike and Cleave damage is increased by 2% per stack of Winning Streak! you had for 12 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crown of Eternal Memorial

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 10,907 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,383 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Tabard of the Argent Dawn
